properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NM_TITLE , NM_POSTER , NM_ENROLL_DATE , NM_APPROVAL , NM_STORY , NM.MEM_NO AS MEM_NO , M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME FROM NO_MOVIE_ENROLL NM JOIN MEMBER M ON (NM.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) ORDER BY DECODE(NM.NM_APPROVAL, 'D', 1) DESC, NM.NM_ENROLL_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT NM_TITLE , NM_POSTER , NM_ENROLL_DATE , NM_APPROVAL , NM_STORY , NM.MEM_NO AS MEM_NO , M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME FROM NO_MOVIE_ENROLL NM JOIN MEMBER M ON (NM.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE NM_APPROVAL = ? ORDER BY NM.NM_ENROLL_NO DESC

INSERT INTO NO_MOVIE_ENROLL ( NM_ENROLL_NO , NM_TITLE , NM_STORY , NM_RELEASE_DATE , NM_RUN_TIME , NM_USER_REQUEST , NM_NICKNAME_STATUS , NM_NATION , NM_VIEW_GRADE , MEM_NO , NM_POSTER , NM_PREVIEW ) VALUES ( SEQ_NO_MOVIE_ENROLL_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

UPDATE NO_MOVIE_ENROLL SET NM_TITLE = ? , NM_STORY = ? , NM_RELEASE_DATE = ? , NM_RUN_TIME = ? , NM_USER_REQUEST = ? , NM_NICKNAME_STATUS = ? , NM_NATION = ? , NM_VIEW_GRADE = ? , NM_POSTER = ? , NM_PREVIEW = ? WHERE NM_ENROLL_NO = ?
INSERT INTO NO_MOVIE_CAST ( NM_CAST_NO , PERSON_NO , NM_ENROLL_NO , NM_CASTING ) VALUES ( SEQ_NO_MOVIE_CAST_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , SEQ_NO_MOVIE_ENROLL_NO.CURRVAL , ? )
UPDATE NO_MOVIE_CAST SET PERSON_NO = ? , NM_CASTING = ? WHERE NM_ENROLL_NO = ?
INSERT INTO NO_MOVIE_GENRE ( NM_GENRE_NO , CATEGORY_NO , NM_ENROLL_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NO_MOVIE_GENRE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , SEQ_NO_MOVIE_ENROLL_NO.CURRVAL )
UPDATE NO_MOVIE_GENRE SET CATEGORY_NO = ? WHERE NM_ENROLL_NO = ?

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , REF_NO , REF_TYPE , FILE_TYPE , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_NO_MOVIE_ENROLL_NO.CURRVAL , '4' , ? , ? , ? , ? , 2 )
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET FILE_TYPE = ? , ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? , FILE_PATH = ? WHERE REF_NO = ?
SELECT NM_ENROLL_NO , NM_TITLE , TO_CHAR(NM_ENROLL_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') NM_ENROLL_DATE , NM_APPROVAL , NM_REFUSE_REASON , MEM_NO FROM NO_MOVIE_ENROLL WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT NM_TITLE , NM_VIEW_GRADE , NM_STORY , TO_CHAR(NM_RELEASE_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') NM_RELEASE_DATE , NM_RUN_TIME , NM_NATION , NM_POSTER , NM_PREVIEW , NM_USER_REQUEST , NM_NICKNAME_STATUS , MEM_NO FROM NO_MOVIE_ENROLL WHERE NM_ENROLL_NO = ?
SELECT NM_CAST_NO , PERSON_NO , NM_ENROLL_NO , NM_CASTING FROM NO_MOVIE_CAST WHERE NM_ENROLL_NO = ?
SELECT NM_GENRE_NO , CATEGORY_NO , NM_ENROLL_NO FROM NO_MOVIE_GENRE WHERE NM_ENROLL_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = ? AND REF_TYPE = 4 AND FILE_LEVEL = 2
